usefulItems: baking tray and baking paper, airtight jar, oven, refrigerator
title: Cashew Butter

ingredients.content: 1 - 2 pinches fine sea salt, to taste

preparations.content: Preheat oven to 180°C and line a baking tray with baking paper.
Place cashew nuts on prepared baking tray and toast for 5-8 minutes (180°C) until light brown. Set aside to cool for 15 minutes.
Place cooled cashew nuts in mixing bowl and grind <b>8 sec/speed 10<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add oil and salt then blend <b>30 sec/speed 6<b> until creamy. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Blend again <b>30 sec/speed 5<b>. Transfer to a bowl and serve or place in an airtight jar and refrigerate until needed.

hintsAndTricks: Toasting the nuts brings more depth of flavour to the cashew butter. The recipe can also be done without this step for an even speedier version.
Spread on toast or bread, use in smoothies or with yoghurt or muesli.
